quotes.quote: The power of imagination is what changes everything.
Arrogance can plant a seed of sin. And loneliness can serve as its nursery.
All problems come from the human mind. In the mind, one's consciousness is just the tip of the iceberg. What lies beneath the surface... the subconscious... is far more vast.

Once the kiln is opened and the pottery inspected, all that are crooked or bear cracks are fated to be smashed. If all that awaited us was the fate of smashed pottery, then we decided we would rather run away in the hopes of finding a different future.
We ultimately fear what spawns from within us.
We have to change our way of thinking if we really want to change the future.
I think there are many things in this world we are better off not knowing. Sometimes the truth is the cruelest thing of all. Not everyone can bear it.
